Purchase options and add-ons Brand Micro Ingredients Item Form Softgel Primary Supplement Type vitamin d3 k2 Diet Type Gluten Free Flavor Unflavored About this item Micro Ingredients double strength 2 in 1 vitamin D3 + K2 coconut oil softgels. An efficiently absorbed formula that contains D3 as cholecalciferol and K2 in its top grade menaquinone (MK7) form. Each pouch offers 300 easy to consume mini coconut oil infused softgels. A potent one a day complex that provides natural sunshine vitamin synergy. 10,000 iu Vitamin D3 and 200 mcg vitamin K2 per dose. Vitamin D3 + K2 are essential micronutrients for adults that work together to support proper calcium absorption to our bones and teeth, while also promoting joint health, immune defense, and heart function. Fat soluble vitamins like D and K are absorbed more completely when a fat source is present. The addition of the healthy MCT coconut oil offers the perfect fat for maximum nutrient bioavailability. Premium non-GMO vitamin D3 + K2 supplements. Made without soy, dairy, gluten, preservatives, flavors, and peanuts. Ingredients must pass our 3rd party lab tests to ensure a product that is safe, pure, and potent. The video guides you through product setup. The video compares multiple products. The video shows the product being unpacked. How do I store this product? We recommend you store it in a well-closed container away from moisture, direct sunlight, and heat. It's a common occurrence for softgels to stick together, but a firm shake of the pouch or a gentle tap against a surface should easily separate them. What is the source of the gelatin in the softgels? The gelatin used in our softgels is sourced from natural bovine, ensuring a high-quality and consistent encapsulation process with every batch. Why do the softgels have a cloudy appearance? Due to the addition of natural coconut oil, it will soften under hot temperatures, which may cause a milky, spotted appearing softgel. Is it normal for there to be a fishy smell when I open the package? The softgels themselves are odorless, however, the sealed pouch can trap scents inside. You may notice a light odor when you first open it, but this has no effect on the product's usability or nutritional value. Iupilon 5.0 out of 5 stars Micro Ingredients Vitamin D3 5000 IU with K2: A Radiant Review Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2025 Style: 5,000IU Coconut Oil Softgels Size: 300 Count (Pack of 1) Verified Purchase This vitamin D3 and K2 supplement duo has been a game-changer for my health and wellness routine! As someone who's always looking for ways to boost my overall health, I decided to give Micro Ingredients Vitamin D3 5000 IU with K2 a try, and I'm so glad I did. Pros: + Tiny but mighty: The soft gels are incredibly small and easy to swallow, making them perfect for those who struggle with larger pills. + Effective dosage: Despite their small size, these soft gels deliver a potent dose of vitamin D, which has noticeably improved my energy levels and mood. + Enhanced absorption: The addition of vitamin K2 not only supports bone health but also helps the body properly absorb vitamin D, ensuring maximum effectiveness. + No bad taste: Unlike some other vitamin supplements, these soft gels have no unpleasant aftertaste. + Affordable price: The price is very reasonable, making it a cost-effective way to invest in my health. + Improved energy and mood: I've experienced a significant boost in my energy levels and overall mood since I started taking these supplements. + Better sleep: Surprisingly, I've also noticed an improvement in my sleep quality, which is an added bonus! + Reduced inflammation: Some reviewers have even reported a reduction in inflammation, which is promising for those with inflammatory conditions. Cons: - Potential for side effects: While I haven't personally experienced any side effects, some reviewers have reported headaches, stomach issues, or other adverse reactions. It's important to consult your doctor before starting any new supplement, especially if you have underlying health conditions or are taking other medications. - Packaging concerns: The resealable bag, while environmentally friendly, can be a bit tricky to open and close. Some reviewers have also reported issues with the bag not sealing properly or tearing. Overall Impression: I'm thoroughly impressed with Micro Ingredients Vitamin D3 5000 IU with K2. This supplement duo has become an essential part of my daily routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality, effective, and affordable way to support their overall health and well-being. However, it's crucial to be aware of potential side effects and consult your doctor if you have any concerns.
